description.value:
Access You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

You're used to fighting and hiding in a haze of smoke and flame. You automatically succeed at the DC 5 flat check to target a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} creature if that creature is concealed only by smoke. When you are concealed or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden} in smoke, increase the DC of the flat check to target you to @Check[type:flat|dc:6]{6} if you're concealed or @Check[type:flat|dc:12]{12} if you're hidden.
